title: Solids, liquids and gases: Newton's laws of motion (TEFC)
creator_credit: Barrie Whatley, Andrew Millington, Open University and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Experimental evidence for Newton’s laws of motion is examined and a number of experiments are demonstrated to show the effect of forces on a massive concrete sphere. Illustrates concepts like kinetic and potential energy, compressional energy and the behaviour of matter in a force free environment
